    • Constructor Detail

      • MapEditorView

        public MapEditorView()
        A constructor that initializes all the UI elements and sets up the initial values. It also initializes the listeners.

    • Method Detail

      • setValues

        private void setValues()
        Sets up the values in all the UI elements.

      • setUpValues

        public void setUpValues()
        Sets up values from the existing data structure (mainly used for loading the map from file)

      • initComponents

        public void initComponents()
        Initializes the UI components and displays the UI

      • initCountryListeners

        private void initCountryListeners()
        Initializes the listeners associated to country data. Adding a country, - It initializes the country object and pushes into - It adds only one neighbour at a time. Update a country - It updates the hashmap in the holder - And also it adds only one neighbour at a time. Delete a country - It deletes the country from hashmap in the holder - But if the neighbouring country is selected, it will be deleted instead.

      • selectTheNeighbouringCountry

        private void selectTheNeighbouringCountry()
        select the neighbouring country from the UI

      • deleteCountry

        private void deleteCountry()
        Delete the selected country from the list. Don't delete if it is part of any sub-connected graph

      • selectCountryFromUser

        private void selectCountryFromUser()
        Select a country to update. Update all the UI element when a country is selected.

      • updateCountry

        private void updateCountry()
        Update the selected country

      • computeCountries

        private void computeCountries()
        Compute the list of neighbouring country. It ignores the selected country and already added neighbours.

      • addContinent

        private void addContinent()
        Add a continent from the UI values

      • selectContinent

        private void selectContinent()
        select the country from the list on UI

      • deleteContinent

        private void deleteContinent()
        delete the continent from UI

      • updateContinent

        private void updateContinent()
        update the continent from the UI

      • initContinentListeners

        private void initContinentListeners()
        Initializes the listeners associated to continent data. * Adding a continent, * - It initializes the continent object and pushes into * Update a country * - It updates the hashmap in the holder * Delete a country * - It deletes the continent from hashmap in the holder

      • initPublicListeners

        public void initPublicListeners(java.awt.event.ActionListener alSaveMap)
        Initialize listeners from the controller.
        Parameters:
        alSaveMap - Listener for saveMap

        Display the frame for the map editor.
